a.n: The Boy with the Wig: Kids on Mozart

p.k: In this 30-minute film, children have their say; boys and girls aged between eight and eleven recount Mozart's life in their own words. Discover Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart through the eyes of children.
p.d: The Boy with the Wig - Kids on Mozart explores children's fascination with the composer. The 30-minute film by Claus Wischmann features boys and girls aged between eight and eleven recounting his life through humour and serious interpretations of Mozart's biography. Discover Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart through the eyes of children.
